original_text: While they were still on the way home, David heard news about what had happened. Someone told him, ‘Absalom has attacked all the king's sons. Not one son is still alive.’
korean_text: 그들이 길에 있을 때에 압살롬이 왕의 모든 아들들을 죽이고 하나도 남기지 아니하였다는 소문이 다윗에게 이르매

sentences.original_text: While they were still on the way home
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 집으로 가는 길에 아직 있을 때

sentences.original_text: David heard news about what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 일어난 일에 대한 소식을 들었다

sentences.original_text: Absalom has attacked all the king's sons
Not one son is still alive
